lead_paragraph: FRANGOS--Eugenia Striphas, on January 21, 2016, of Forest Hills Gardens, NY. Beloved wife of James and devoted mother to Alexandra Frangos and George (Caroline). Loving grandmother to James and John. Visiting at Fox Funeral Home, Inc., 98-07 Ascan Ave., corner Metropolitan Ave., Forest Hills, Wednesday, 1-4pm and 6-8pm. Funeral Services at St. Demetrios Greek Orthodox Church, 84-35 152nd St., Jamaica, NY, Thursday, 12:30pm. Interment Maple Grove Cemetery. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FRANGOS, EUGENIA STRIPHAS
